node.name: MGCP Commands
node.description: This node allows to configure global MGCP settings. These include the various port numbers.

node.name: NAT Commands
node.description: This node allows to configure the global NAT settings. These include the destination address of the MSC, the filter and rewriting rules to use.

node.name: BSC Commands
node.description: This node allows to configure a BSC. A BSC has a list of LACs, an access token associated to it.

node.name: Paging Group Commands
node.description: This node allows to configure a Paging Group. A Paging Group holds the LACs of several destinations and a BSC can refer to a Paging Group. This way several BSCs can receive the paging for a shared LAC.
